text: The prime minister of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic is the head of government of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic (SADR), a government in exile based in the Sahrawi refugee camps of Tindouf, Algeria. The post of the prime minister has been held by Mohamed Wali Akeik since February 2018. ==Prime ministers of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic (1976–present)== ==Notes== ==See also== *History of Western Sahara *List of colonial governors of Spanish Sahara *President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic ==References== ==External links== *World Statesmen - Western Sahara Category:Government of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic Category:Politics of Western Sahara
title: Prime Minister of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
